    Current page:  CME
                                        
    		Be a part of the College of Communication & Education
    	The College of Communication & Education (CME) is committed to preparing students for leadership roles in their communities, professions, and relationships. To meet the needs of a diverse society, we continue to build learning environments that focus on combining disciplinary knowledge and personal development with practical application.Each of our programs and departments present students with unique opportunities that challenge and enrich their university experience. Some of the opportunities available include quality internships, attentive mentorship, real-world training, and other applications focused on professional preparation. Información en españolOur Programs and Departments

    		                The Student Success Team is a resource for all students in the College of Communication and Education. We help students navigate academics, get support, and find their place at Chico State.
    College of Communication & Education (CME)400 West First Street  Chico, CA 95929  Tehama Hall, Room 203530-898-4015cme@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/cmeZip 0145Support Our College(opens in new window)Program PortfolioCollege of Communication & Education ProgramsCommunication StudiesCommunication Sciences & DisordersMedia Arts, Design & TechnologyJournalismKinesiologyLiberal StudiesRecreation, Hospitality & Parks ManagementSchool of Education
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
